mapper.select: SELECT code , name , format(amount, 0) as amount , format(buyprice, 2) as buyprice , format(evalValue, 0) as evalValue , format(ratio, 2) as ratio , format(currentValue, 0) as currentValue FROM web_data.${account}_account_status order by code asc

select DATE_FORMAT(his_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as his_time , account_name , code_name , stock_code , format(buy_num, 0) as buy_num , format(sell_num, 0) as sell_num , format(amount, 0) as amount , format(ratio, 2) as ratio , format(profit, 0) as profit from ${account}_history where account_name = #{account} and stock_code = #{stock_code} order by his_time desc

select DATE_FORMAT(his_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as his_time , account_name , code_name , stock_code , format(buy_num, 0) as buy_num , format(sell_num, 0) as sell_num , format(amount, 0) as amount , format(ratio, 2) as ratio , format(profit, 0) as profit from ${account}_history where account_name = #{account} and stock_code = #{stock_code} and DATE_FORMAT(his_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') between #{start_date} and #{end_date} order by his_time desc

select DATE_FORMAT(his_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as his_time , account_name , code_name , stock_code , format(buy_num, 0) as buy_num , format(sell_num, 0) as sell_num , format(amount, 0) as amount , format(ratio, 2) as ratio , format(profit, 0) as profit from ${account}_history where account_name = #{account} order by his_time desc

select date_format(his_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as date , if(sum(profit) is null, 0, format(sum(profit), 0)) as profit from ${account}_history where account_name = #{account} and sell_num > 0 and amount = 0 and DATE_FORMAT(his_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-%d') order by date desc

select date_format(account.date, '%Y-%m-%d') as date , account.acc_value , kospi.changes as kospi_changes , kosdaq.changes as kosdaq_changes from web_data.account as account , web_data.코스피지수내역 as kospi , web_data.코스닥내역 as kosdaq where account.acc_name = #{account} and date_format(account.date, '%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(kospi.dates, '%Y-%m-%d') and date_format(account.date, '%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(kosdaq.dates, '%Y-%m-%d')
select date_format(date, '%Y-%m-%d') as date , acc_value , acc_value from account where acc_name = #{account}
